value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral Plays The BROOD LORD Micro Trick! (Cure vs Serral)
value.excerpt: Long macro game of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral, the current SC2 World Champion, and Cure. In this match Cure decides to open up with a Terran turtle style.
